text: Isaac Clinton "Clint" Miller (born May 24, 1939) is an American attorney who served twenty-four years as a member of the Virginia House of Delegates and ten years as a judge of the Virginia State Corporation Commission. He previously served from 1967 to 1971 as commonwealth's attorney for Shenandoah County.House Joint Resolution no.245, 30 January 2006 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Virginia Republicans Category:American University alumni Category:Washington and Lee University School of Law alumni Category:People from Wilkes County, North Carolina
title: Clinton Miller
